name: @j-cake/mkjson
description: The make-like build tool that lives in your package.json.

scripts.build:rebuild: tsc -p tsconfig.json && $npm_execpath run build:cli && $npm_execpath run build:meta
scripts.build:cli: mkdir -p build && ln -f cli.js build/cli.js && esbuild src/index.ts --outdir=build --bundle --sourcemap --splitting --platform=node --format=esm
scripts.build:meta: cat package.json | jq -r '{name, description, keywords, author, repository, version, type, main: "cli.js", bin: "cli.js"}' > build/package.json && ln README.md build/README.md
scripts.test: find test -name \*.js | xargs -I {} bash -c 'node {}; echo [{}] exited with code $?'

check.run: pnpm exec tsc -p tsconfig.json && pnpm run build
